properties.ownership: not owned by a public authority
properties.notes: The calculation used for net minimum (and net dwelling range from) is 60% of the site area multiplied by minimum indicative density (Policy HO7) (in this case 40 dwellings per hectare). The calculation used for net dwelling range to is 70% of the site area multiplied by the same minimum indicative density.
